name: Music Hell
description: Music Hell is a combination two games genres: bullet hell and rhythm.  You are a musician who signs up for a battle of instruments, but the situation gets out of control and you will have to dodge your opponent's notes/bullets while trying to play your instrument to shoot your opponent. The game will have different enemies with increasing difficulty with the pass of levels. After passing some levels you can choose between some improvement to your shots, extra life or others.
